idea: HomeCliq Proptech Private Limited is based out of Mumbai. The objective of our venture is to provide a technology enabled single window advisory and closure solution to home buyers and investors in real estate (both residential & commercial) with respect to the core objective of identifying the right property and also provide ancillary services support including interior designing, construction QC, property management, movers & packers, rent collection etc.
name: HOMECLIQ PROPTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: RIGHT FEST CONSTRUCTION PRIVATE LIMITED  is a leading real estate company. We are specialized in our work and provide excellent service to our customers. With the help of high-quality services, luxury interior, safe and secure locations we have built trust among our customers. We are one of the leading real estate companies, which offer complete construction solution under one roof. We offer unique, creative and designer residential and commercial constructions at a competitive price in the market. Just because of our amazing work and honesty we have built healthy relationship with our clients and looking forward to increase the number of happy customers. Our work strategies are very simple and payment gateway is transparent, means you get high-quality service at the best price in the industry without any hidden charges. We have a team of experts who deliver satisfactory work with full dedication and punctuality.
name: RIGHT FEST CONSTRUCTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
PatilKaki has existed since 2016 but it’s ecommerce inception was in December 2020. It took off with a small marketing budget. But, what followed was a plethora of orders and business which grew at an unanticipated pace.

PatilKaki has had a staggering month on month average growth rate of 35%+ (from Jan 21 - Oct 21). Average returning customer contribution is 37% of the revenue.
name: PatilKaki

idea:
JoGenii is India's first curated platform for discovering hands-on learning and skill-building educational toys, games, kits and other products.


90% of brain development happens by age 6 and WHO recommends less than 1 hour screen time. Yet most solutions in the market for engaging kids and building skills are focused on online solutions. JoGenii aims to create awareness of hands-on learning and importance of educational toys for young kids., and be the go-to platform for all learning needs.
name: SHIVYAAN LEARNING SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Hello there,


fles is a newfound startup engaged in smart bottle product design and manufacturing. We are building a smart bottle which can filter any sort of water for drinking purpose. Our intention is to bring a better water storage and enhance the water quality for each of the India citizen who cannot afford/no access to clean water for some reason. Our intention is not just limited to filtration but we are also focused on integrating health related technologies like hydration measurement, alkaline water, glucose meter and many more. By using the saliva, we can obtain many data related to health. Apart from that, we also want to reduce plastic consumption by putting an hold on use of reusable packaged drinking water bottles which are causing enormous issue in environment. Our bottle is a self cleaning device which can eliminate viruses and bacteria which are even caused by stagnant water stored in RO filter tank and the mold created along the tap. The revolution to smart has started already and we are stepping ahead to enhance the lifestyle and classic look of water bottles as an accessories.
name: ECOOP LIFESTYLE PRIVATE LIMITED
